CustomField.description: The payee's age at the date of cessation.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( tc9_pr__Employee__r.Birthdate ) ), IF( DATE( 2000 , MONTH( tc9_pr__Employee__r.Birthdate ) , DAY( tc9_pr__Employee__r.Birthdate ) ) <= DATE( 2000 , MONTH( tc9_pr__Cessation_Date__c ) , DAY(tc9_pr__Cessation_Date__c) ) , YEAR (tc9_pr__Cessation_Date__c) - YEAR ( tc9_pr__Employee__r.Birthdate ), YEAR (tc9_pr__Cessation_Date__c) - YEAR ( tc9_pr__Employee__r.Birthdate ) -1) , null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The payee's age at the date of cessation.
CustomField.label: Payee Age at Exit Date
